name: Draw Road
description:
Game submitted by Reshma Bhandari :

Draw and drive the jeep. Enjoy !!

Controls :

R : Restart the game

 UP and DOWN arrow key : Accelerate and Brake

 LEFT and RIGHT arrow key : Rotate vehicle

LEFT MOUSE CLICK : Draw Road

F : Zoom out

Made with Construct 3 for Reilly Gamejam 6 for theme "Quirky Platformer Mechanics"
